name: Manhattan
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 ounces Maker's Mark bourbon (or rye if you prefer)
Maraschino cherry or lemon twist for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Shake one or two drops of bitters into a cocktail glass, gently twisting the glass from side to side. Shake out excess, leaving only the residue.
Mix bourbon or rye with sweet vermouth in a mixing glass. Add ice. Shake well. Strain contents into cocktail glass. Add cherry or lemon.
